description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Finance

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn Finance

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .



Includes following tutorials:

Introduction,
Finance Theory,
Corporate Finance,
Financial Planning,
Financial Statement I,
Financial Statement II,
Cash Flow,
Time Value of Money I,
Time Value of Money II,
Net Present Value,
Corporations,
Bond and Stock,
Valuation of Bond I,
Valuation of Bond II,
Valuation of Stock,
Risk and Return I,
Risk and Return II,
Capital Structure I,
Capital Structure II,
Capital Budgeting,
Dividend Policy,
Corporate Finance Formula,
Financial Math,
Financial Ratio.


Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Financial Planning and Finance Theroy,
Quiz on Time, Value of Money ,Net Present Value and Cash Flow,
Quiz on Bond, Stock, Risk and Return,
Quiz on Cpital Structure, Budgeting, Dividend and Finincial Ratio.


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
